attributes.action: prevent George Martin, the retiring speaker, from being awarded a peerage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the first speaker in nearly 300 years to be effectively forced to resign, it would be innapropriate, under the current circumstances, that this was seen to be rewarded with a peerage, and not in keeping with the mood of the country

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
